data.message: Why is my Facebook market place blocked.  I used this a lot. I please ask that you unblock it. Please tell me what is wrong.  I see cussing, ugly pictures and nudity. I have never done this. Please apply asap so this matter can be fixed. I'm 64 and admit I'm computer dumb. Please unblock me and tell me what is wrong

replies.message: Hi LaDonna. It sounds like you may have overused a feature, even if you didn't mean to. Hold tight until you can access it again. Thanks for your patience! -Ashley
Facebook how long will this be
how long will that be. I sell my garage sale items on market place. Also my phone was hacked by my x son in law we believe
